title: Corrections and clarifications
body:
If we have published anything that is factually inaccurate, please contact the editor on 01698 205237,at 
kenny.barr@reachplc.com or atWishaw Press, One Central Quay, Glasgow, G3 8DA, and, once verified, we will 
correct it as soon as possible.

TheWishaw Press is published by Media Scotland Ltd, a subsidiary company of Reach PLC, which is a member of 
IPSO, the Independent Press Standards Organisation. We adhere to the Editors'Code Of Practice as enforced by 
IPSO who are contactable for advice at IPSO Gate House, 1 Farringdon Street, London, EC4M 7LG.Tel: 0300 123 
2220.Website:www.ipso.co.uk, email advice@ipso.co.uk

If you have a complaint concerning a potential breach of the Code of Practice, we will deal with your complaint 
directly or IPSO can refer your complaint to us. Please go to www.reachplc.com/howtocomplain where you can 
view our Complaints Policy and Procedure. A"HowTo Complain"pack is also available by writing to the Legal and 
Compliance Department, Reach PLC, One Canada Square, CanaryWharf, London, E14 5AP.
